p: Not all provinces were epidemic nodes: Jiangxi and Jilin had one fatality each ( Figure 1B). Thus, these two provinces did not generate secondary fatalities. In contrast, the slopes of geo-temporal data on mortality differentiated, at least, three epidemic nodes: (i) rank I (Hubei), (ii) rank II (Heilongjiang and Henan), and (iii) rank III (Anhui and Chongqing) nodes ( Figure 1C).
